well that was pretty cool. I heard "K Passa"  "saw mw". God file  Bonnie!

Have no idea,  sometimes these beings whomever, whatever they are say 
th=
ings, maybe just to  impress us, I got this one last night and recorded it =

through my spirit  trumpet using just a mic, and my pc goldwave recorder, =
I put 
some silver wire  used for sodder wires in a radio, just hung it dow=
n in a 
few big loose balls,  set the mic just inside, here's what I got.  =
It sounds 
like forgain  language, says what sounds like "K passa"  then on=
 it's 
reverse I hear;  "You saw me."  I can also hear what sounds like "he=
y possium, you 
saw  me"  weird how they can do this stuff. sf
